title: Unemployment rate in Canada 2024
summary: This statistic shows the Unemployment rate in Canada from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .
In 2018 , the Unemployment rate in Canada was at approximately 5.79 % .
gold: The statistic shows the unemployment rate in Canada from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024.
In 2018 , the unemployment rate in Canada was at around 5.83 percent.
Canada 's economy Three-quarter of Canada 's workforce is employed in the services sector , with the other two sectors , agriculture and industry , accounting for the rest of Canada 's employment .
